pr_title: PR #728 attempt 2: Fixed buggy netty-reactive-streams test and re-added changes from PR

timeline.bodyText: As discussed, let's look into simplifying this either with a single threaded test or using .getAndIncrement() to cache the value instead of get() that then requires a compareAndSet()
timeline.author: bmaizels

replies.bodyText: Re-wrote it to use a single-threaded executor, which is what I think the original author was trying to do by scheduling it on the parent event-loop executor. That way there's no concurrency concerns at all.
replies.author: millems

timeline.message: Fixed a race condition in netty-reactive-streams test: BatchedProducer would sometimes miss that it should stop producing data.
Fixed a race condition in netty-reactive-streams test: BatchedProducer would sometimes miss that it should stop producing data.

Revert "Revert changes in PR#728"

This reverts commit 4ac0ba8f5fb8c89ba9526f3629bf4a0b5e2b784b.
